bike.description: Co-molded 110 GSM OCLV carbon mainframe; Co-Molded 110 GSM OCLV carbon chainstays & seatstays, G2 Geometry

components.description: Fox F120RL, 120mm travel, custom G2 Geometry 46mm offset crown, air spring, external rebound adjustment
Bontrager Rhythm Elite, 28mm wide tubeless ready* rims
Bontrager XDX, 2.2 (58/56), 120 TPI, aramid folding bead
Bontrager Race Lite, superlight hollow cromoly rails
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon ACC, Carbon & Aluminum Shaft, 20mm Offset infinite adjust Bontrager head
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon OS Riser, 40mm rise, 650mm width, 7d backsweep, 4d upsweep, 31.8mm
Bontrager Race X Lite OS, 7d rise, 31.8mm
Avid Elixir R, hydraulic disc, integrated reservoir w/tools-free reach adjust, 185mm front/160mm rear G2 Clean Sweep 6-bolt rotors
